```{r}
x<-c(0.5,0.6)      ##numeric
y<-c(TRUE,FALSE)   ##logical
z<-c(T,F)          ##logical
a<-c("a","b","c")  ##character
b<-c(9:29)         ##integer
c<-c(1+0i,2+4i)    ##complex
x;y;z;a;b;c;
```

#vector using vector function
```{r}
x<-vector("numeric", length=10)
x
```

# convert data types 
```{r}
x<-0:6
class(x)
as.numeric(x)
as.logical(x)
as.character(x)
```

#non-sensical coersion
```{r}
x<-c("a","b","c")
as.numeric(x)
as.logical(x)
as.complex(x)
```
#lists
```{r}
x<-list(1,"a",TRUE,1+4i)
x
```
